verses.text: Now it came to pass, as David sat in his house , that David said to Nathan the prophet , Lo, I dwell in an house of cedars , but the ark of the covenant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add remaineth\add* under curtains.
Then Nathan said unto David , Do all that \add is\add* in thine heart ; for God \add is\add* with thee. \p
¶ And it came to pass the same night , that the word of God came to Nathan , saying ,
Go and tell David my servant , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thou shalt not build me an house to dwell in :

For I have not dwelt in an house since the day that I brought up Israel unto this day ; but have gone from tent to tent , and from \add one\add* tabernacle \add to another\add*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft have gone: Heb. have been\f*
Wheresoever I have walked with all Israel , spake I a word to any of the judges of Israel , whom I commanded to feed my people , saying , Why have ye not built me an house of cedars ?

Now therefore thus shalt thou say unto my servant David , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , I took thee from the sheepcote , \add even\add* from following the sheep , that thou shouldest be ruler over my people Israel :\f + \fr 17.7 \ft from following: Heb. from after\f*

And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked , and have cut off all thine enemies from before thee, and have made thee a name like the name of the great men that \add are\add* in the earth.

Also I will ordain a place for my people Israel , and will plant them, and they shall dwell in their place, and shall be moved no more; neither shall the children of wickedness waste them any more , as at the beginning ,

And since the time that I commanded judges \add to be\add* over my people Israel. Moreover I will subdue all thine enemies. Furthermore I tell thee that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will build thee an house. \p

¶ And it shall come to pass, when thy days be expired that thou must go \add to be\add* with thy fathers , that I will raise up thy seed after thee, which shall be of thy sons ; and I will establish his kingdom.
He shall build me an house , and I will stablish his throne for ever.
I will be his father , and he shall be my son : and I will not take my mercy away from him, as I took \add it\add* from \add him\add* that was before thee:
But I will settle him in mine house and in my kingdom for ever : and his throne shall be established for evermore.
According to all these words , and according to all this vision , so did Nathan speak unto David. \p

¶ And David the king came and sat before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and said , Who \add am\add* I, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God , and what \add is\add* mine house , that thou hast brought me hitherto ?

And \add yet\add* this was a small thing in thine eyes , O God ; for thou hast \add also\add* spoken of thy servant’s house for a great while to come , and hast regarded me according to the estate of a man of high degree , O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God.
What can David \add speak\add* more to thee for the honour of thy servant ? for thou knowest thy servant.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for thy servant’s sake, and according to thine own heart , hast thou done all this greatness , in making known all \add these\add* great things.\f + \fr 17.19 \ft great…: Heb. greatnesses\f*
O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add there is\add* none like thee, neither \add is there any\add* God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.

And what one nation in the earth \add is\add* like thy people Israel , whom God went to redeem \add to be\add* his own people , to make thee a name of greatness and terribleness , by driving out nations from before thy people , whom thou hast redeemed out of Egypt ?
For thy people Israel didst thou make thine own people for ever ; and thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, becamest their God.
Therefore now, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, let the thing that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant and concerning his house be established for ever , and do as thou hast said.

Let it even be established , that thy name may be magnified for ever , saying , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts \add is\add* the God of Israel , \add even\add* a God to Israel : and \add let\add* the house of David thy servant \add be\add* established before thee.

For thou, O my God , hast told thy servant that thou wilt build him an house : therefore thy servant hath found \add in his heart\add* to pray before thee.\f + \fr 17.25 \ft hast…: Heb. hast revealed the ear of thy servant\f*
And now, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou art God , and hast promised this goodness unto thy servant :

Now therefore let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant , that it may be before thee for ever : for thou blessest , O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add it shall be\add* blessed for ever.\f + \fr 17.27 \ft let…: or, it hath pleased thee\f*
